review: The Chromecast is still a rather new device, and Google is still updating the API for developers to use. We'll see a lot more support as time goes on. We use ours primarily for Netflix. We also have an IP camera that we use as a baby cam on our computer. We can stream the camera straight to the Chromecast as well.Hulu Plus is now supported along with Pandora and a bunch of other apps. We've got two and recently gave one as a gift. It's great if you only use it as a netflix streamer, but as more apps support it there will be more and more uses for it. All I need is Amazon Instant Video support and I'll be good to go!

review: Product has lot of limitation e.g. you cant change the network without factory resetting. I took it with me on trip and it doesn't work on hotel networks. Also when casting tab, laptop is useless because it takes over all of CPU cycles. Only streaming option that works is 480, very poor quality.Chromecase needs wifi. you cant even set it up if there is no wifi for chromecast. if PC is able to connect to wifi and chromecast cannot it should still allow casting tab but it doesnt.Only useful option is if you are playing from youtube or netflix. Google needs to learn from Apple how to produce Quality product.
